Header.title: Smart-train simulator
Header.paragraph: From vision to reality, our cutting-edge Smart Train project is accelerating into the future of intelligent transportation. Designed to revolutionize the way we experience rail travel, this initiative harnesses the power of artificial intelligence and computer vision to enhance safety, efficiency, and sustainability across every level of the rail system.

Features.title: Entity & Object Detection
Features.text: The camera detects entities or objects such as humans or vehicles.

Features.title: Website Live View Camera
Features.text: A secure website that can be accessed to view the surroundings from the camera anywhere in real time.

Features.title: Signal Communication Transferring
Features.text: The camera will transmit communication signals that can provide warnings to the train in case of danger, especially at intersections.

Features.title: Rechargeable and Eco-Friendly Power Savings
Features.text: The camera power can be recharged periodically, and the use of solar panels helps maintain its performance at all times.

Features.title: Automatic Train Protection
Features.text: Implements an automatic safety system on trains designed to prevent accidents caused by human error, such as exceeding speed limits.
